column4: Is there a command which will disable internet, and it can ONLY be enabled again through terminal?
what is full command to disable and enable?
exactly what command would I type to disable internet?
man dhclient. i think it's dhclient <interface> -r. to release it. i dont remember exactly.
I have tried reading man but I'm confused. :(
if it was wireless interface, you'd type sudo dhclient wlan0 -r
its a cable going into computer
then type ifconfig and see the name of the active interface
sudo ifdown eth0 gives me:  koerber@koerber-desktop:~$ sudo ifdown eth0
in your output, it shows eth0, so it should work. try eth1
